text: The President of the Reichstag was the presiding officer of the German legislature from 1871 to 1918, under the German Empire and again from 1920 to 1945, under the Weimar Republic and Nazi Germany. ==Presidents of the Reichstag== |- |colspan="7" bgcolor="lightgrey" align=center| Presidents of the Reichstag |- |colspan="7" bgcolor="lightgrey" align=center| Presidents of the Weimar National Assembly |- |colspan="7" bgcolor="lightgrey" align=center| Presidents of the Reichstag ==Presidium of the Reichstag== ==References== *German ministries 1871â€“1945Rulers.org Category:Politics of Germany
title: List of presidents of the Reichstag
